page.title: 18EVENTS IN MOORSHOLM
page.content: The Memorial Hall is the focus of most of the events in the village (See other page on EVENTS IN MOORSHOLM). Other activities also play a big part in the life of the village. These include: A Gymkhana since 1983. Annual Carol singing followed by a supper. Annual sports day held on the Recreation Field. Chapel outing. Annual trip to the pantomime. Christmas shopping trip to Newcastle. Senior Citizens outing. Craft fairs. The Church holds a miscellany night most years on which all are expected to perform in some way. The Plough Inn holds a Harvest Produce sale to raise money for the Senior Citizens Christmas gifts. The Methodist Chapel also holds a Harvest auction. Liverton village has a village garden party each year.
